entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, who is feeling watched and senses something unusual.

entities.name: street
entities.description: A deserted street where Harry is standing, described as having large square houses with no lights on.

entities.name: garage
entities.description: A garage behind Harry, which has a door that gleams in the light of his wand.

entities.name: fence
entities.description: A fence behind Harry, where he senses something standing between it and the garage.

entities.name: alleyway
entities.description: A narrow black alleyway behind Harry, which is described as having a hulking outline of something big with wide eyes.

relationships.description: Harry is standing on the street, which appears to be deserted.
The garage is behind Harry, where he senses something unusual.
The fence is adjacent to the garage, where Harry senses something standing between it and the garage.
The alleyway is behind Harry, where he sees a hulking outline of something big with wide eyes.
